title: The Person I Respect
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>I think the part of you that always gives your best is incredible, Setsuna-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eeeh!? No, I’m still very much lacking. Everyone around me is just so amazing, including you, Dia-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Including me!? I’m not really.... But, you’re right. It’s easy to get influenced when everyone else is so talented, isn’t it? I also feel that way.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You too, Dia-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes. I have my own model that I want to run after.... Eli-.... No, let’s keep it a secret. Regardless, I am still in the process of reaching for that dazzling light myself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I get that feeling! I want to improve myself more and more and get closer to the person I admire!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, that’s right. May I ask who it is for you, Setsuna-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s my favorite novel’s.... No, I’ll keep it a secret too! Let’s both work hard to become someone that our idols can be proud of!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Okay! Then, Setsuna-san, would you like to train together with me after this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes, please! I’ll welcome it no matter how tough it is!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
